about_the_game:
A fantasy game designed especially for women. Your choices will lead you through a world of romance, where every path taken can alter your destiny as you determine who will be the man who captures your heart.

STORY

In this demo, experience the first 5 chapters of Love in an Enchanted Realm. Step into the shoes of Elara, a gentle healer lost in a mystical land, accompanied by three enigmatic companions who each hold the key to her survival.

CHARACTERS

Behind this rogue's quick wit and charming smile lies a past that casts a long shadow. Ryker’s playful nature and skill in battle make him a formidable ally, but it's up to you to see through his façade and reach the vulnerable heart beneath.

A former soldier and the natural leader of the group, Caden is steadfast and honorable. His unwavering sense of duty to protect his companions often conflicts with his growing affection for Elara. Will he let love guide him or stay bound by his responsibilities?

A gentle mage who doubts his own abilities, Finn’s intelligence and resourcefulness are vital to the group's survival. As you help him find confidence in his powers, will you also find a deeper connection?

GAMEPLAY FEATURES IN THIS DEMO

  • Interactive Map: Select between story or combat points on the map, giving you the freedom to explore at your own pace.

  • Story Mode: Immerse yourself in a 2D visual novel-style narrative where you get to meet Ryker, Caden, and Finn, each with distinct personalities and roles in battle. Get a glimpse into their relationships with Elara as you begin to form alliances.

  • Combat Mode: Experience 2 strategic, turn-based battles with fully animated 3D models and environments. Watch as the characters and enemies come to life in dynamic combat sequences. Control Elara and her companions, each with unique abilities, to overcome dangerous enemies.

  • Choices Matter: Your decisions in both the story and combat will affect the course of Elara's journey, shaping the relationships you build and the challenges you face in the future.

  • Dynamic CG: Enjoy a beautifully crafted 2D cutscene featuring subtle parallax effects, adding depth and movement to a key story moment.
